## RequestManager.sendBatchAsync() method

Should be used to asynchronously send a batch request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendBatchAsync(data: RPCSendableMessage[]): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | [RPCSendableMessage](./eth-connect.rpcsendablemessage.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The RPC message to be sent |

Promise&lt;any&gt;
